content:
Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 16, "index": 22}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 30}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft a dark_oak_boat, I need to place 3 dark_oak_planks in the top row of the crafting grid and 2 more in the center of the middle row. Therefore, I will start by moving one dark_oak_plank from slot 30 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 16, "index": 22}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 30}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}]
thought: I have already placed one dark_oak_plank in the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1), so now I need to move another dark_oak_plank to the top right corner (slot 3).
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 3 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 16, "index": 22}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}]
thought: I have placed two dark_oak_planks in the top row of the crafting grid, so now I need to move another dark_oak_plank to the center of the middle row (slot 4).
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 16, "index": 22}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 30}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}]
thought: I have placed three dark_oak_planks in the top row and middle column of the crafting grid, so now I need to move another dark_oak_plank to the bottom right corner (slot 5).
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 5 with quantity 1

thought: I have placed four dark_oak_planks in the top row and middle column of the crafting grid, so now I need to move another dark_oak_plank to the bottom left corner (slot 6).
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 6 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 6}, {"type": "spruce_leaves", "quantity": 16, "index": 22}, {"type": "brick", "quantity": 31, "index": 23}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "iron_door", "quantity": 15, "index": 43}]
thought: I have successfully crafted a dark_oak_boat, so now I need to move it from the crafting slot (0) to an empty slot in my inventory (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
